attributes.action: Allow all airport expansion plans e.g.3rd runway at Heathrow and bring forward the High Speed Rail link between London + Glasgow.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know how the economic crisis is affecting us all, by expanding our airports we will increase the amount of jobs in the market and the tourism industry will gain a boost as it will be easier to fly into the UK. Please help me in this campaign to stop the fight against airport expansion and to get the high speed rail link from London to Glasgow brought forward.
